text: @NYCMayor I don't live in NYC, but you've closed the subway system, right? Only an idiot would leave that obvious nuclear bomb of coronavirus spreading operate normally.  I mean, anyone who would let 5 million of their constituents use it everyday, would be the world's #1 idiot, right?
